title: hi, when is 'your shop' coming back?
body: i have some RP and i dont really get much RP throughout the year cuz im a broke college student but i was wondering if i should save this RP until 'your shop' returns or should i just splash this remaining RP on whatever skin im feeling

replies.body: Typically that personal shop comes around for holidays and special events, but right now I don't have the upcoming dates for when it will be back. Be sure to check the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) for that info when it's released though!
"Your Shop" usually happens around big events like near Christmas time or Thanksgiving.
